sourcesContent:
import React from "react"; import Footer from "../UI/Footer"; import Navbarr from "../UI/Navbar"; import farmer from "../assets/Farmer.gif"; import farmer2 from "../assets/Farmer2.gif"; function Home() { return ( <>

{" "} Voice4Rural

  1. Connect people to nearby vaccination centres to book their places from the available booking slots.
  2. {" "} Connecting with buyers to facilitate selling of handmade products made by the village people to make use of their self-learned skills and make some money.{" "}
  3. Collect various job recommendations that have been posted in various social platforms and bringing them under a single roof that matches the profile of the user.
  4. Scraping information from twitter about changes in policy or any existing setups. Also displaying news of deemed importance from ministry or any national authority.{" "}
  5. Providing hourly updates about changes/fluctuations in the prices of essential commodities, sensex, petrol, diesel, gold.
  6. Predicting the weather A social media platform where people can post their problems so that users from all around can jointly provide a solution or provide support.

How we help?

Booking done in the nearest hospital on basis of available slots. A simple setup to assist people who aren’t much familiar with technology. Another easy tso use setup to post the handmade-items along with the negotiable price and the contact details. This will be a really good step up in turning India atmanirbhar and will also in turn help the needy. Matching jobs based on the user profile and giving updates based on that. Almost everyone in villages are looking for jobs and this would surely help them in the run. Apart from newspapers, news from social media isn’t accessible by majority of the rural people. Instead of showing all, if we display messages based on their interests/any major announcements that would surely help the people. The middle men often take advantage of the farmer’s/rural people’s inability to catch up with the latest fluctuations in price, this keeps the farmers at a loss. Hence with proper hourly updates displayed in our webapp, it won’t stand a problem anymore. Prior updates about weather, storms or natural calamities, can keep the people prepared beforehand. Social media based feature to bring one’s problem(which went unaddressed) on a larger platform.

); } export default Home;
